channel.title: Blog on NENRIKIDO
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on NENRIKIDO

item.title: Mega Site Update
item.description: Brand new fonts, search finally works, new blog tag filter, site got SASS’ed, microblog bug is squashed, and more!

item.title: Firefox Tree Tabs Tu(tour)ial
item.description: Welcome to my crib, Mozilla Firefox edition. With instructions on how to recreate it!

item.title: Yard Sale
item.description: A diary entry. Featuring Hot Topic fashion and a sandwich.

item.title: Bye-bye Bootstrap
item.description: Bootstrap gets the boot, my hair gets a trim, and the site gets a map.

item.title: 2 months later: A Neocities Reflection
item.description: Some observations about the community aspect of Neocities and online communities in general.

item.title: Site Updates
item.description: new library with 61 current entries! (and a shrines page!)

item.title: Making a Preloader
item.description: How to make a simple full-page loading screen for your site.

item.title: Site Updates ...Continued!
item.description: is the site running any faster? it should be running faster.

item.title: Site Overhaul
item.description: lots and lots and lots of new things.

item.title: Reusable HTML Snippets: Web Components
item.description: A small tutorial on using Javascript to reuse HTML snippets.

item.title: Making a Website (Part 1): The Planning Stage
item.description: The blog got a bit of a makeover! Anyways, this is the first post in a series I’ve planned about building websites. It’s aimed towards the absolute beginner, but hopefully, it’ll still be interesting or useful for people with more experience.
